name: Acute Otitis Media #1
diagnosis: Clinical diagnosis based on tympanic membrane findings and symptoms
management: Amoxicillin 80-90 mg/kg/day divided BID for 5-10 days

name: Bronchiolitis #2
management: Supportive: nasal suctioning, fluids, oxygen if needed. No routine bronchodilators.

management: Amoxicillin or ceftriaxone based on severity; admit if hypoxic
